Help Center less Jackson Subedi add Follow done Following Followers 3,039 Following 56 Public Views Address: Kathmandu, Nepal less Interests CV Uploads Papers by Jackson Subedi Troika Potato Chips Case Analysis Download Entrepreneurship and Economy Download Human Resource Management Report for Non Profit Organization Greenepal Download Employee Relation Management Report for World Link Communications The term "Employee Relationship Management" (acronym ERM), translate as "management of the relati... more The term "Employee Relationship Management" (acronym ERM), translate as "management of the relationship with the employees" refers to the use of technologies in the management of human resources. This concept is based on client relationship management, with the employee at its center.
